title: House for sale in Nugegoda
details:
It's a spacious house located in a superb neighborhood.

Walking distance to Gansaba Junction ( Nugegoda ) Quick access roads to Colombo, Nugegoda,Kotte ,Kohuwala and Pepiliyana areas.

Further details:

Bedrooms : 5( A/C )
Bathrooms:4( Solar hot water )
Separate maids room and bathroom
Rooftop area

Spacious living , Dining areas and balcony space for each room.
17.5 perch property with a nice garden space.

Ideal for a family !

Contact us for more details
